EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Made for Each Other: Microservices + PaaS_Q414.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Pivotal & Redmonk Webinar is tomorrow 11/18
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We'd like to remind you of your registration for our upcoming webinar Made for Each Other: Microservices + PaaS tomorrow, November 18, 2014. Please see event details below:
Date: Tuesday, November 18, 2014 Time: 10AM PST/6PM GMT
Event Number: 668 535 734 Join the Webex <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=668535734> Teleconferencing Information: This webinar will be streaming live, however dial-in options are available:
- US TOLL FREE: 1-855-749-4750 - Global call-in numbers <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=33226853&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 668 535 734
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
See you tomorrow! The Pivotal Team
